## Excercise 1


```{r co2}
str(co2)
```

```{r plot co2}
plot(co2)
```

```{r decomposition co2}
co2_d <- decompose(co2, type = "additive")
plot(co2_d)
```


## Excercise 2

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r UKgas}
str(UKgas)
```

```{r plot UKgas}
plot(UKgas)
```
```{r decomposition UKgas}
UKgas_d <- decompose(UKgas, type = "multiplicative")
plot(UKgas_d)
```
